description.en:
Sakura's dream has come true, her grandfather has engaged her to her crush, Kamijo-sensei. She is very happy until she learns that the only reason he agreed to marry her was because her grandfather told him that she was sick and didn't have much time left. Will she be able to tell Kamijo-sensei the truth and let him go or will she continue the lie to keep him close?  (From: Aria)

Italian/Italiano: 
Il sogno di Sakura è diventato realtà! Grazie al nonno è riuscita a fidanzarsi con Kamijo-sensei, ragazzo di cui è innamorata. Ma un giorno scopre che il nonno ha convinto il ragazzo, dicendogli che lei era malata e che aveva poco tempo a disposizione!
